about_the_game:
The Unbroken Early Access demo consists of a small portion of the full game. Unbroken is expected to release in Early Access on 18th Feb with a rough estimate duration of 6 months.

The demo consists of:

-The war memory tutorial level

-A small section of the main game world around the area called Nelsons Crossing

-A preview of the arcade mode.

The players stats and unlocks are updated for the demo to estimated early midgame stats: walljump unlocked, speed upgraded, jump height upgraded and hp upgraded, as well as certain weapons and resin unlocked from registered point of rest. These are all unlocked-and much more- through progression in the full game.

The war memory level will provide explanation of the major game mechanics: the resin kick, combat basics with throwing and dodging as well as bullet deflection and melee countering. This culminates in a critical moment and test of grit.

The Nelsons Crossing section is a brief preview of the full game map and exploration. 

For more varied maps, use the carriage outside coltons rest to be teleported to a selection a action levels.

content_descriptors.notes: The game contains explicit stylised blood and violence, cursing and self medication.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 or newer
  • Processor: Dual core from Intel or AMD at 2.8 GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: nVidia GeForce 260 or ATI/AMD Radeon HD5670
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 6 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Win 10 or newer
  • Processor: Intel Core i7 3770 @ 3.5 GHz / AMD FX 8350 @ 4.0 GHz
  • Memory: 32 GB RAM
  • Graphics: nVidia GTX 2060 6GB or better
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 6 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible

short_description: Brave the hostile lands in search of your goal. Forge your own path and discover the many secrets of the realm and the looming Township of Westfall. Unlock new abilities, perks and weapons. Soak in the atmosphere and head forth against all odds.
